resources.string: Nuntius requires access to notifications. When the notification settings will open, select Nuntius checkbox and confirm. Then hit the back button.
Nuntius allows you to proxy the notifications with other devices. Just enable the notification sharing for Nuntius after pressing "Got it" and pair the Bluetooth with the specific device.
Bluetooth is not available on this device
Nuntius requires Bluetooth to be enabled
Now select Nuntius checkbox and confirm. Then hit the back button.
